headline.main: SMOKERS BUYING MARGINAL BRANDS; Less Known Cigarettes Are Big Business in U.S.

docs.abstract: Mktg Factors study shows marginal cigarette brands sales acct for $1-billion of total '67 sales; filter cigarettes sales up 8% over '66, represent 73% of '67 sales; once popular nonfilter brands seek to regain sales by mktg new filter versions
